title: Bug 116786 - Library include should store relative path.
description: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path. For example, suppose the report design is located at $project/test. Now, include a library from $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary.
OB: The BIRT designer does not generate and save the relative path when including a library in a report design.
EB: The BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path when including a library in a report design.
SR:
1. Open the BIRT designer.
2. Load a report design located at $project/test.
3. Include a library from $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary.
4. Verify that the BIRT designer generates and saves the relative path for the library inclusion.
